main.name: Yahya Mohamud
main.bio: Passionate about the Tech industry. Energetic contributor with demonstrable details orientation, and multitasking/organizational proficiency. Willing to take any responsibilities regardless of the challenge. Experience in Web developer, seeking opportunities to bring a knowledge of programming/designing. Able to be a creative problem solver who works hard and loves a challenge. A team player with excellent communication and leadership skills.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, send me a email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Love learning and coming across new technologies

education.description: Web Development Bootcamp. 70+ hours per week including project based coding, accelerator designing and building web applications in both front-end and back-end environments. Working on individual and group projects in the Node.js frameworks. Learning DRY coding, RESTful routing, MVC, TDD and pair programming.

work.title: Facilities Coordinator
work.description: Actively support an environment of teamwork, cooperation, performance, and personal success. Assisted with the maintenance and enhancements of procedures, Created and handle trouble tickets, managed email, and phone communication for the teams. Provide direction/information to vendors, facilities staff and service providers as required to ensure excellent coordination/execution of work within client environment with minimal disruption

work.title: SSC Shift Supervisor
work.description: Ensure accountability and punctuality of SSC operators. Perform analysis and quality assurance for teamwork product Monitor threat intel, analyze, detect, and take preventive actions. Assist with short term investigations, including but not limited to conducting video reviews, pulling badge reads, escalating incidents to the Global Investigations Team, and reporting incidents to Human Resource Business Partner.

work.title: Web Producer
work.description: Working with a nonprofit organization on building their website. Designing website and stragetize Digital Marketing campaigns. Ensured the smooth functioning of the website by reguarly checking the navigation links on the website. Enchance the website by optimizing it with the necessary graphics. Tested newly developed code to ensure correctness and performance of components and templates in the CMS.

work.title: GSOC Operator
work.description: Access Control: Monitor and respond to alarms triggered at corporate headquarters, roastery, Security/Incident Management. Monitor and respond to security incidents in progress at Starbucks headquarters, and roasting plants and regional offices throughout US, Canada, and Costa Rica.Use integral and external systems (internet, social media, news-feed, and other data sources) to monitor risks that could have a potential impact to assets, facilities, and personnel.

work.title: Freelance
work.description: Freelance Web Developing with local web design firm. Contributed by redesigning mockups, HTML & CSS responsive websites. Worked in a team-oriented environment for all aspects for product development (design, implementation, and maintenance support). Web Developing local web design firm. Contributed by redesigning mockups, HTML & CSS responsive websites. Working with nonprofits and small businesses in the Seattle area.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Accessed and documented procedures, tools, and manuals to provide support on company-supplied hardware and equipment. Gathered customer and technology information to determine technical support level; elevate calls to appropriate support level, as necessary. Accurately processed and documented call transactions using tracking software. Assist team members and provide support and solutions to customer queries to meet company objectives. Installed and configured printers and scanners, resetting default device password, and setting up anti-virus/bit locker to prevent cyber-attacks.

skills.name: GitHub
skills.description: I use Github for all of my projects so far. I have used Github for version control in small teams and have love playing around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am a rookie to React, and was pretty difficult at first. But its starting to be my one of my fave languages, due its simplicity and will continue to use it going forward.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice.

skills.name: Bootstrap
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: Vercel
skills.description: Once I got introduced to â€‹Vercel, didn't look further. It is a cloud platform for static sites and Serverless Functions that fits perfectly with your workflow. I deployed one of my projects (Bitcoin Price app) on Vercel , and it works instantly all with no configuration. Gotta love it!

skills.name: Netlify
skills.description: I use Netlify as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: I've had the opportunity to work with Yahya on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Yahya tends to excel at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
